briefTitle: A Controlled Trial of Erenumab in Migraine Prevention
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Japanese Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Erenumab in Migraine Prevention
summary: The purpose of this study was to assess the efficacy and safety of erenumab for prevention of migraine in Japanese adults with episodic migraine (EM) and chronic migraine (CM).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Monthly Migraine Days (MMD) Over Months 4, 5, and 6 of the Double-blind Treatment Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 4-week baseline period and the last 3 months (months 4, 5, and 6) of the 24-week double-blind treatment period
